thread.title: TravelPass Group Surpasses $1 Billion in Hotel Bookings with the Expedia Affiliate Network
thread.title_full: TravelPass Group Surpasses $1 Billion in Hotel Bookings with the Expedia Affiliate Network | Business Wire

author: http://www.businesswire.com/
title: TravelPass Group Surpasses $1 Billion in Hotel Bookings with the Expedia Affiliate Network
text:
LEHI, Utah- Matching the right accommodations with the right customers is a hallmark for TravelPass Group. Recognized among the fastest growing private companies in the U.S., TravelPass Group brands have surpassed $1 billion in gross booking revenue as a top partner of the Expedia Affiliate Network (EAN). TravelPass Group operates five travel-related websites, including Reservation Counter and Reservation Desk.
“Reaching $1 billion in gross bookings through the Expedia Affiliate Network is a significant milestone,” said Daniel A. Nelson, Executive Chairman of TravelPass Group. “We’re working to create the best ‘shopping’ experience for travelers with more choices and the best prices available. Plus, our platforms and expertise help hotels stand above the noise and complexities of the industry to reach first-time and last-minute customers.”
Currently, TravelPass Group sites feature more than 58,000 hotels through its integration with EAN, helping customers find the hotel that fits their needs best. EAN works with thousands of partners to turn their web traffic into hotel bookings, in turn helping millions of travelers. EAN is a division within Expedia, Inc. Group, one of the largest travel companies, with access to more than 200,000 hotels worldwide.
About TravelPass Group
TravelPass Group is becoming a leading company in the travel industry. Part of the Utah-based company Partner Fusion, TravelPass Group is a marketplace for independent and brand name hotels, wholesalers and the world’s largest travel agencies. Multiple times it has been featured among Utah’s fastest growing companies, and by Deloitte Technology Fast 500 and Inc. 5000. It operates five travel-related websites, including ReservationCounter.com and ReservationDesk.com, and a best-in-class customer service center that helps travelers access more than 1 million properties worldwide.
